name: Eye Strain - DEMO
description:
PLEASE NOTE this is an very early alpha build!!!!!!

If you play my game please leave a comment id love to hear what you think and im very open to feedback.

A few problems with the demo ill fix it soon.

First is if you hit an enemy and pause at the same time then unpause the game will still be paused. Just hit the pause button two more times and it fixes it.

Next problem is I left debug mode in with left trigger it doesn't really do much if you happen to press it just press it again to get rid of it.
